files.patch:
@@ -173,0 +173,9 @@ + *

+ * All {@code URL} constructors may additionally throw + * {@link MalformedURLException} if the underlying {@link URLStreamHandler} + * implementation rejects, or is known to reject, any of the parameters. + * In particular when the stream handler's {@linkplain + * URLStreamHandler#parseURL(URL, String, int, int) parseURL method} is + * called during URL construction and it throws {@code IllegalArgumentException}. + * However, which checks are performed is implementation dependent, and + * callers should not rely on such checks for full URL validation. @@ -355,1 +364,3 @@ - * is a negative number other than -1 + * is a negative number other than -1, or if the + * underlying stream handler implementation rejects, + * or is known to reject, the {@code URL} @@ -383,1 +394,3 @@ - * @throws MalformedURLException if an unknown protocol is specified. + * @throws MalformedURLException if an unknown protocol is specified, + * or if the underlying stream handler implementation + * rejects, or is known to reject, the {@code URL} @@ -418,1 +431,3 @@ - * is a negative number other than -1 + * is a negative number other than -1, + * or if the underlying stream handler implementation + * rejects, or is known to reject, the {@code URL}

@@ -132,0 +132,4 @@
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation of the protocol
+     *                  handler rejects any of the given parameters
+     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code u} is {@code null},
+     *                  or if {@code start < limit} and {@code spec} is {@code null}
@@ -500,0 +504,3 @@
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation of the protocol
+     *                    handler rejects any of the given parameters
+     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code u} is {@code null}
@@ -529,0 +536,3 @@
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation of the protocol
+     *                    handler rejects any of the given parameters
+     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code u} is {@code null}
